Package com.netflix.adminresources

Class Summary
AdminResourcesContainer This class starts an embedded jetty server, listening at port specified by property AdminResourcesContainer.CONTAINER_LISTEN_PORT and defaulting to AdminResourcesContainer.LISTEN_PORT_DEFAULT.
HealthCheckServlet A health check resource available via AdminResourcesContainer, this in turn just calls the HealthCheckInvocationStrategy to invoke the configured HealthCheckHandler.
LoggingFilter A Filter implementation to capture request details like remote host, HTTP method and request URI
RedirectFilter A Filter implementation to redirect root requests to a default location as specified by the dynamic property AdminResourcesContainer.DEFAULT_PAGE
